page.title: 15FARMING AT MR. LATHAMS
page.content: On Mr.Latham's farm the permanent pasture is near to Flash Farm because this where the milking parlour is placed.The cattle therefore do not have far to walk from the fields to get milked. The barley is grown in three areas,all of which are close to School Farm, where barley is dried and stored.The oil seed rape fields are all close together.This makes it easier to harvest and also stops it spreading into other crops.Potatoes have been planted in fields that are of a certain size to enable the machines to harvest them more easily and other vehicles to spray the crops more conveniently.Certain fields have a particular crop because of the cash value of the crops and due to crop rotation.
